page.title: 12VISITORS TO SKEGNESS
page.content: In Skegness we have hundreds of visitors every year.Most residents attitudes to the visitors are that they think they own Skegness.There are many different attitudes to the visitors.Around 20% of the residents like the visitors coming to Skegness and around 80% of the residents dislike the visitors coming because of the noise,the litter and the crowds.But sometimes it feels nice to have Skegness occupied again after the lonliness of the winter. Lumley Road is the busiest spot in Skegness because it is surrounded by shops.It is the main shopping area.In the summer it is very difficult to walk down Lumley Road as it is so crowded.
